review: We use it with Amazon Prime, Netflix, & YouTube mostly. Easy to use, and usually fast/very responsive. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of five is the WiFi occasionally won't connect to our home network. I then have to unplug the stick from the TV and power adapter to reset it. Also, after using it for about a month now,  the remote is starting to feel like it may not hold up to long term use.... I guess we'll find out because my whole family uses it.
